description: the schema definition for EzTerry's JSON Recipe Edit
title: JSON Recipe Edit Schema

___file.description: The file to load as a JSON Script

___count.description: if not set to -1 (default) only remove recipes that return a stack of this many items per craft
size of the item stack to return [default = 1]

___mirrored.description: Can the recipe be mirrored (default = true)

___count.description: size of the item stack to return [default = 1]

___name.description: Name of the ore dictionary entry

___items.description: List of items to add to this ore dictionary entry

___xp.description: amount of XP to give 0.1 by default.

___count.description: Number of items that smelt per craft

___name.description: name of the command chain (displayed in server/log messages from the commands, default "VCommandChain"

___trigger.description: The trigger when this command chain is to be ran

___log.description: if we log output or not, useful for debugging but otherwise spams the log, default: false

___dim.description: The dimention to run on, use "*" to run on all/any loaded dimention, default "*"

oneOf.description: the system (command block) command to run

___fortunemultiplier.description: if dropone=false, multiply each entry by this number for each level of fortune default 1.10

___dropchance.description: chance of collected items are dropped 1.0 = 100%, default = blocks default rate

___dropone.description: Drop one item from the weighted list, (otherwise odds of each item are separate) default=false

___drops.description: list of possible drops and odds

___weight.description: Weight of the item, if dropone=false: 1.0 = 100% drop, else is used as a weight with all other entries

___count.description: size of the item stack default=1

___silktouch.description: list of drops when using silk touch (same as drops if omitted entirely)

___weight.description: Weight of the item, if dropone=false: 1.0 = 100% drop, else is used as a weight with all other entries

___count.description: size of the item stack default=1

___silkdropone.description: Drop one item from the weighted list when silk touching, (otherwise odds of each item are separate) default=<value of dropone>

___exp.description: amount of exp to drop when not silk touched (default -1, the original amount)

___meta.description: blockstate of the block being broken default: ""

___droporiginal.description: To keep the original drops for the block or not default=true

___lightlevel.description: The light level of the block default: current value

___unbreakable.description: if true make unbreakable, else current state, to make breakable set hardness

___lightopacity.description: The light level of the block default: current value

___harvestlevel.description: The blocks harvest tool/level: default: current value

___hardness.description: The block hardness default: current value

___resistance.description: The block resistance default: current value

___unlocalizedname.description: The untranslated name of the block default: current value

___slipperiness.description: The slipperiness of the block default: current value

___maxstack.description: the maximum stack size of this item default: current value

___norepair.description: if true prevent the item from being repaired false/omitted keep current value

___harvestlevel.description: The blocks harvest tool/level: default: current value

___unlocalizedname.description: The untranslated name of the block default: current value

___maxdamage.description: the maximum damage a tool can have default: current value

___to.description: The new value to set the items to

___from.description: The original value to change (default: -1 to change make 'to' the new maximum)

___count.description: Number of items to return per craft

___levels.description: Cost in levels of the craft

___modifiercount.description: Number of modifier items to consume per craft

___count.description: size of the item stack to return [default = 1]

___tool.description: Tool to craft the item with

oneOf.description: Ore dictionary entry for source item
Item entry for source item

___fluid.description: The result fluid of melting recipes to remove (matches both metal and amount)

___output.description: The resulting fluid stack including amount

oneOf.description: Ore dictionary entry of item to melt
Item stack entry for source of item to melt

___fluid.description: The fluid input of the recipe to be removed (amount ignored)

oneOf.description: Remove the recipe without a cast item
Item used as the cast for the recipe to be removed.

___switchoutput.description: If item becomes a cast (default false, ignored if cast is null)

___consumecast.description: If the cast item is delete at the end of the craft (default true, ignored if cast is null)

___fluid.description: The fluid (and amount) to pour onto the cast

oneOf.description: Pour directly into the table (no cast/item)
Ore dictionary of the items to use as the cast
Item to pour onto/into as a cast

___fluid.description: The fluid input of the recipe to be removed (amount ignored)

oneOf.description: Remove the recipe without a cast item
Item used as the cast for the recipe to be removed.

___switchoutput.description: If item becomes a cast (default false, ignored if cast is null)

___consumecast.description: If the cast item is delete at the end of the craft (default true, ignored if cast is null)

___fluid.description: The fluid (and amount) to pour onto the cast

oneOf.description: Pour directly into the table (no cast/item)
Ore dictionary of the items to use as the cast
Item to pour onto/into as a cast

___fluid.description: The fluid of the alloy to remove

items.description: A component ration and the amount per combining unit

___input.description: The input item of the recipe aa crusher recipe to remove

___outputtwocount.description: The stack size of the input count (default 1)

___outputtwo.description: The input item of the recipe aa crusher recipe to remove (default empty stack)

___chance.description: The chance (0-never to 100-always) to return the secondary output (default=5)

___outputone.description: The input item of the recipe aa crusher recipe to remove

___input.description: The input item of the recipe aa crusher recipe to remove

___outputonecount.description: The stack size of the input count (default 1)

___item.description: The item to remove from the ball of fur return list

oneOf.title: Actually Additions Remove Ball of Fur item

___count.description: the stack size to return if returned (default = 1)

___chance.description: the chance/weight of returning this item.

___item.description: The item to add to the ball of fur return list

oneOf.title: Actually Additions Add Ball of Fur item

___item.description: The item to remove from the treasure chest loot

oneOf.title: Actually Additions Remove Treasure Chest item

___min.description: Minimum number of the item in a stack (default=1)

___max.description: Maximum number of the item in a stack (default=1)

___chance.description: the chance/weight of returning this item.

___item.description: The item to add to the treasure chest loot

oneOf.title: Actually Additions Add Treasure Chest item

___item.description: The item (recipe result) to remove from the reconstructor list

oneOf.title: Actually Additions Remove Atomic Reconstructor recipe

___output.description: The item to the transformed into

___energy.description: the energy cost of the transformation

___input.description: The source item to be reconstructed

oneOf.title: Actually Additions Add Atomic Reconstructor recipe

___item.description: The item (recipe result) to remove from the empowerer list

___energy.description: the energy cost per items stand

___switchoutput.description: If item becomes a cast (default false, ignored if cast is null)

___consumecast.description: If the cast item is delete at the end of the craft (default true, ignored if cast is null)

items.description: ammount in mb of the item stack, default 1000

___fluid.description: The fluid (and amount) to pour onto the cast
